key_narrative_locations.feature: Indian cabinet where diamond was kept
Paint wet on night of June 21
Where Rosanna hid the nightgown and drowned herself

perception_constraints.constraint: Rachel could see into her sitting-room from her bedroom
perception_constraints.implication: She could witness Franklin without being seen

perception_constraints.constraint: The first-floor corridor connects all guest bedrooms
perception_constraints.implication: Godfrey could observe/follow Franklin from the corridor

perception_constraints.constraint: Servants' quarters separate from family rooms
perception_constraints.implication: Betteredge unaware of night events on upper floor

perception_constraints.constraint: Shivering Sand accessible from both estate and Cobb's Hole
perception_constraints.implication: Rosanna could reach it secretly; Limping Lucy could observe
